title: Print, "Halt of a Wagon-train, from Harper's Weekly, February 6, 1864, pp. 88-89", February 6, 1864
medium: Wood engraving in black ink on newsprint paper with slight coloring added by hand.
description: Horizontal view of a group men seated and standing about an open fire in the foreground with a large number of covered wagons in the background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Halt of a Wagon-train, from Harper's Weekly, February 6, 1864, pp. 88-89", February 6, 1864.
February 6, 1864. Wood engraving in black ink on newsprint paper with slight coloring added by hand.. Gift of Arthur B. Carlson. 1951-93-9.
